DOC.brief_summary: This study perform demonstrate treatment valdecoxib 10 mg daily ( QD ) least effective naproxen 500 mg twice daily ( BID ) , standard non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAID ) , take 6 week Korean subject symptomatic osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee . Secondary objective assess overall safety tolerability valdecoxib 10 mg QD take 6 week Korean subject symptomatic OA knee .
DOC.brief_title: Double-Blind , Double Dummy , Randomized Comparison Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Valdecoxib 10 mg Once Daily Naproxen 500 mg Twice Daily Treating Signs Symptoms Osteoarthritis Knee
DOC.criteria: Korean outpatient symptomatic radiologic evidence OA knee ( diagnose accord modified American College Rheumatology criterion ) Patient 's Assessment Arthritis Pain measurement least 40 mm VAS Patients receive NSAIDs analgesic within 2 day ( within 4 day subject take oxaprozin , piroxicam full dose aspirin ) prior Baseline Visit Diagnosis inflammatory arthritis , gout , pseudogout , Paget 's disease , chronic pain syndrome , Investigator 's opinion , would interfere assessment Index Knee Symptomatic anserine bursitis acute joint trauma Index Knee Arthroscopy perform Index Knee within past 12 month Complete loss articular cartilage Index Knee Administration oral , intramuscular , intravenous , soft tissue injection corticosterosteroids within 4 week prior screen visit Administration intraarticular injection corticosteroid hyaluronic acid preparation Index Knee within 3 month 6 month , respectively
